body:
I would expect the output to be json. @kubernetes/kubectl 

$ kubectl get no -o jsonpath="{.items}"

labels.description: Denotes an issue that needs help from a contributor. Must meet "help wanted" guidelines.
labels.name: help wanted

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG CLI.
labels.name: sig/cli

title: jsonpath template output should be json
